TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IProvideCustomContentState

summary.span: 在從內容巡覽至別處之前，由需要新增自訂狀態至內容之巡覽記錄項目的類別實作。

span.span: Implemented by a class that needs to add custom state to the navigation history entry for content before the content is navigated away from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓您建立關聯的自訂狀態，以做為自訂實作類別，與瀏覽歷程記錄項目遠離瀏覽內容。 allows you to associate a piece of custom state, implemented as a custom class, with the navigation history entry for content that has been navigated away from. 也可以使用下列方法以這種方式相關自訂狀態：Custom state can also be associated in this way by using the following: - 呼叫**AddBackEntry**:Calling **AddBackEntry**: - - - 。. - 設定任一下列事件引發時：Setting when one of the following events are raised: - - - - 您必須實作當您新增自訂狀態到瀏覽歷程記錄藉由呼叫**AddBackEntry**，否則瀏覽歷程記錄將無法正確運作，請考慮下列步驟：You must implement when you add custom state to navigation history by calling **AddBackEntry**, otherwise navigation history will not function correctly; consider the following steps: 1. **AddBackEntry**呼叫以將自訂的狀態與目前的內容產生關聯。**AddBackEntry** is called to associate a custom state with the current content. 2. 瀏覽歷程記錄項目巡覽回，而呼叫方法的自訂狀態時，以及狀態套用至內容。The navigation history entry is navigated back to, and the method of the custom state is called, and the state is applied to the content. 3. 先前的內容是向前巡覽記錄中巡覽。The previous content is navigated to in forward navigation history. 4. 瀏覽歷程記錄項目巡覽回，但自訂狀態不會保留關聯的瀏覽歷程記錄項目所巡覽最後一次。The navigation history entry is navigated back to, but the custom state has not been retained since the last time the navigation history entry it was associated with was navigated to. 這是預設行為，因為已將它加入瀏覽歷程記錄之後，可能會變更一開始會記錄在自訂狀態的狀態。This is the default behavior because the state that is initially recorded in custom state may change after it was added to navigation history. 如果自訂狀態物件巡覽回，並且它的狀態，在某些方面的狀態變更之前，巡覽至巡覽記錄中的項目之前狀態變更無法反映在自訂狀態物件。If the custom state object is navigated back to and its state is applied, before some aspect about the state changes before the entry in navigation history is navigated to, the change in state cannot be reflected in the custom state object. 此外，無法明確呼叫來新增自訂狀態物件，這會反映狀態變更。Furthermore, can't be explicitly called to add a new custom state object that reflects the state changes. 因此，以確保目前狀態的特定瀏覽一律儲存在瀏覽歷程記錄中呼叫。Consequently, to ensure the current state for a particular navigation is always stored in navigation history, is called. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您將資訊儲存自訂內容的狀態時，您無法儲存的頁面會記住其狀態的執行個體的任何參考。When you store information in custom content state, you cannot store any references to the instance of the page for which you are remembering state. 這可防止[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]釋放頁面執行個體和擊敗的目的預設巡覽記錄行為。This prevents [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] from releasing the page instance, and defeats the purpose of the default navigation history behavior. 如果您必須這麼做，您可以考慮使用改為。If you must do this, you might consider using instead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState GetContentState() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回要與巡覽記錄中內容產生關聯的自訂狀態類別的執行個體。

span.span: Returns an instance of a custom state class that is to be associated with content in navigation history.

returns.span: 要與巡覽記錄中內容產生關聯的自訂 類別的執行個體。

span.span: An instance of a custom class that is to be associated with content in navigation history.
